review.title: “My time as an intern was spent learning and growing as a modern marketer”
review.pros: Pros – Warm, family culture; located in a great town (Athens,); nice, fun employees; provides a great environment to learn and develop
review.cons: Cons – Lack of resources; small company with little opportunity for advancement; small clients with the possibility of mundane projects; lack of experience
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Make more of an effort to connect with the interns; continue to focus on cultivating and growing the brand; attract new clients
